definitions.definition: Various sounds, usually unwanted or unpleasant.
definitions.example: He knew that it was trash day, when the garbage collectors made all the noise.

definitions.definition: Sound or signal generated by random fluctuations.
(by extension) Unwanted fuss or bustle; useless activity.
The measured level of variation in gene expression among cells, regardless of source, within a supposedly identical population.

definitions.example: The problems with the new computer system are causing a lot of noise at Head Office.

definitions.definition: Music, in general; a concert; also, a company of musicians; a band.
A genre of rock music that uses static and other non-musical sounds, also influenced by art rock.
To make a noise; to sound.
To spread news of; to spread as rumor or gossip.
